thinking.disposable_income: The IAH Airport area has a moderate median household income with many residents working in airport-related services and logistics.
thinking.discretionary_consumption: Residents have moderate discretionary spending capacity but are sensitive to additional taxes and fees due to the working-class nature of many airport-related jobs.
thinking.accessibility: The area is heavily car-dependent due to its suburban location, with limited transit options primarily serving airport workers and travelers.
thinking.decision_rationale: 1) Prioritized lower sales tax (0.5-1.0%) due to moderate income levels 2) Favored moderate driving fees ($0.5) to improve transit without overly burdening drivers 3) Supported lower transit fares ($0.75-$1.25) to help airport workers who rely on transit 4) Balanced travel time improvements for both modes given mixed transit/driving usage 5) Considered the impact on airport accessibility for both workers and travelers
